name: Fallen Enchantress: Upgrade to Ultimate
description:
Please note, Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes is required to play and enjoy this content.

Contains the Fallen Enchantress/Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes Map Pack DLC, and the Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes DLC: Battlegrounds, Dead World, Leader Pack, Loot Pack, and Quest Pack

Lead your empire as one of 21 sovereigns like the traitor Emperor Karavox or the pyromancer Asha Furnaceborn. Recruit heroes to champion your cause, expand your kingdom to gather valuable resources, and engage in tactical battles against hundreds of opponents from the Burning Wraiths to the Ashwake Dragons.
